login.wrong_credentials: Invalid email or password. For safety reasons, after 10 failed attempts your account will be locked for 60 minutes.

resend_email_verification.description: To restart the confirmation process we will send you a new email. Remember to use the same email you used on your first registration attempt. If you don't receive it and it's not in your Spam folder, restart your account creation.
resend_email_verification.title: Resend confirmation email

reset_password.success: You have changed your password successfully
reset_password.title: Reset password

step0.description: Start your consultation by identifying your needs
step0.title: Initial Chat

step1.description: We will match you with the most suitable professional
step1.title: Professional Assignment

step2.description: Initiate periodic conversations with a therapist through chat or video
step2.title: Start Your Transformation

chat_side_panel.no_plan_b2b: You don't have a plan yet. Please talk to your agent to get assigned one.
chat_side_panel.no_plan_b2c: You don't have a plan yet.
chat_side_panel.plan_chat_active: You have an active chat plan
chat_side_panel.plan_emotional_care_active: You have an active emotional support plan

conversation_initial.title: Welcome to Your Confidential Space
conversation_initial.description: Your guiding psychologist will respond as soon as available. In the meantime, you can tell us what brought you here.

therapist.title: Connecting You to a Therapist
therapist.description: We will notify you as soon as we connect you with him or her, so you can start your conversation.
therapist.info_box: This process may take longer on weekends or outside of working hours. But don't worry, we will contact you first thing on the next working day and extend your plan if necessary.

generic.auth_token: Your session expired, please login again
generic.contact_admin: If error persists after a few minutes, please contact the administrator
generic.title: Sorry, there was an error

login.credentials_after_3_tries: Invalid email or password. For safety reasons, after 10 failed attempts your account will be locked for 60 minutes.
login.credentials_first_3_tries: Incorrect password or email. You still have {{num}} tries.
